ygData.subject: Re: The Fiery Avenger
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Aradune himself stated the sword would be paladin only in release.  What are we in now?  Release.  So that makes the fiery avenger what?  Paladin only.
ygData.messageBody:
Michael Wooldirdge wrote:
>
> I don't know where you guys are hearing this but the Fiery Avenger is
> not paladin only. First off the Fiery Avenger is two handed and
> Paladin's wield one handed swords. Orginally it was supposed to be
> Paladin only but in beta Paladin's moved frorm using two handed swords
> as their holy swords to one handed. Also Shadow Knights big weapon is
> the Dark Reaver 20 dmg 42 dly and casts some spell. The warriors big
> weapon is the Executioner's Axe 25dmg 50dly both the Dark Reaver and
> Axe are in Lower Guk.

Aradune himself stated the sword would be paladin only in release. What
are we in now? Release. So that makes the fiery avenger what? Paladin
only. Simple deductive reasoning would show you where we got our
answer. Sheesh. And.. Paladins can handle a 2hand sword just as good
as a 1 hand sword.. heh. Most paladins i see have 2hand slash weapons
actually.
